# Assets and Needs Assessments Reports

<br>

<center> Passwords for Reports are [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAUdWEzc0R7WzpztOvutRp2FYDtpks37LSFV8sq8ezg/edit?usp=sharing) which will only be viewable if you are a Teaching Lab employee. </center>

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c(
    "NYC District 27 - All Sites",
    "NYC District 27 - PS 104, NY",
    "NYC District 27 - PS 306, NY",
    "NYC District 27 - MS 210, NY",
    "NYC District 27 - PS/MS 183, NY"
  ),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(
    "Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_104_ny.png",
    "Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_104_ny.png",
    "Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_104_ny.png",
    "Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_306_ny.png",
    "Images/Reports/ANA_21_22/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_306_ny.png"
  ),
  link = c(
    "Reports/ana_reports/may_report_all_district_27_sites.html",
    "Reports/ana_reports/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_104_ny.html",
    "Reports/ana_reports/may_report_nyc_district_27__ps_306_ny.html",
    "Reports/ana_reports/may_report_nyc_district_27__ms_210_ny.html",
    "Reports/ana_reports/ms_183_ny.html"
  )
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "Reports",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
